name: Super Bowled Over Trivia Quiz | NFL Super Bowl | 10 Questions

questions.text: The first Super Bowl was held on January 15th, 1967. It featured the Green Bay Packers against the Kansas City Chiefs. Where was it held?
questions.explanation:
Los Angeles Memorial Coliseum.

	The Green Bay Packers won the game 35-10.

questions.text: As defending title-holders Packers won again the following year in Super Bowl II. Who were their opponents?
questions.explanation:
Oakland Raiders.

	Vince Lombardi's team beat the Raiders by 33-14.

questions.text: Who was MVP in Super Bowl III?
questions.explanation:
Joe Namath.

	'Broadway Joe' shone in the Jets' victory over the Baltimore Colts.

questions.text: The Kansas City Chiefs won Super Bowl IV. Who did they beat?
questions.explanation:
Minnesota Vikings.

	The Chiefs beat the Vikings by 23-7 on January 11th, 1970.

questions.text: Don Shula took the Miami Dolphins to victory in Super Bowls VII and VIII. In how many Super Bowls did he end up on the losing team?
options: none-he won the only two he appeared in
questions.explanation:
4.

	He lost Super Bowl III as the coach of the Baltimore Colts and the other three with the Dolphins.

questions.text: Who were the two finalists of Super Bowl XII?
options: Washington Redskins and New England Patriots
questions.explanation:
Dallas Cowboys and Denver Broncos.

	The Cowboys beat the Broncos by 27-10, on January 15th, 1978.

questions.text: Joe Montana of the San Francisco 49ers has been Super Bowl MVP on three separate occasions?
questions.explanation:
True.

	1982, 1985, and 1990:  Super Bowls XVI, XIX, and XXIV.

questions.text: Who were the protagonists of Super Bowl XX?
questions.correct: Chicago Bears and New England Patriots
options: New Orleans Saints and Houston Oilers
San Francisco 49ers and Tampa Bay Buccaneers
questions.explanation:
Chicago Bears and New England Patriots.

	Mike Ditka's Bears beat the Patriots by 46-10, on January 26th, 1986.

questions.text: The winning margin of Super Bowl XXV was 34 points?
questions.explanation:
False.

	On January 27th, 1991, Bill Parcels' New York Giants beat Marv Levy's Buffalo Bills by just one point.

questions.text: The Buffalo Bills made four consecutive Super Bowl appearances and managed to lose every one of them. Who was the unfortunate Buffalo Quarterback?
questions.explanation:
Jim Kelly.

	Super Bowls XXV, XXVI, XXVII and XXVIII.
